name: Videos on Admin Dashboard
author: Nahiro.net - Wordpress Hilfe & Support

sections.description:
Videos on Admin Dashboard allow you to embed Youtube and Vimeo tutorials, help or support videos quickly and easily into the dashboard of your WordPress website. You just install the plugin and copy the video link on the administration page and you have clear access to your videos, support YouTube and or Vimeo videos. In the Administration section, you can specify which users can see the videos, in addition you can enter the title of your widget, and it’s also perfect for helping your customers or website users by using help or support videos.

Features

  • Include Youtube, Vimeo or Google Drive tutorials and support videos for your customers or for your WordPress dashboard.
  • Fast and light.
  • Control which user role can watch the videos on the dashboard.
  • Active languages: English, German,Spanish.

WordPress Hilfe & Support – Nahiro.net

Videos on Admin Dashboard Pro

With the premium version of this plugin you can have unlimited videos and widgets.

Videos on Admin Dashboard Pro
sections.installation:
1. Extra the contents of the .zip file and upload videos-on-admin-dashboard to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add videos to your WordPress website dashboard by clicking settings on menu Videos on Admin Dashboard and following the instructions there.
sections.faq:
What Video formats are supported?

Right now Videos on Admin Dashboard supports YouTube and Vimeo videos.
